events.message: The insured reported a minor collision involving their car and a streetlight yesterday evening.
Based on the information, the claim has been categorised under auto accident due to vehicle collision.
An agent has been assigned to the auto accident claim to begin customer communication and next steps.
The insured was contacted and the claim acknowledgement was confirmed with positive feedback.
Request sent to the insured for accident photos, police report, and insurance card copies.
The insured submitted all requested documents including detailed photos of the vehicle damage and police report.
The investigation team has started reviewing the submitted documents and background of the reported auto collision.
Investigation confirmed the reported accident details and damage assessment are consistent with the claim.
A settlement offer has been proposed to the insured covering the vehicle repair costs and associated expenses.
Positive feedback received from the customer regarding the fairness and timeliness of the settlement proposal.
The claim has been officially approved after customer acceptance of the settlement terms.
Payment for the approved claim amount was issued to the insuredâ€™s account promptly.
The auto accident claim has been closed successfully following payment issuance and customer confirmation.
